f=
irst then nothing else matters anyway"  from the Tech. sf

rites:

 
 
 
So, Another intellectually challenged hater has invaded  Fran=
k's group to 
throw out insults about GBC? You are not unique,  original or=
 inventive with 
your skepdick attack! You are just another  closed minded =
know-it-all with 
too much time on your hands, who needs to  get a meaningf=
ul life. Like a 
pesky fly, we just ignore your buzzing  around until you g=
o away!!
